DOC.brief_summary: A new device develop screen sleep-breathing disorder . Within device new software algorithm determine sleep/wake state . The aim study evaluate performance new algorithm . This prototype compare commercially available device monitor sleep/wake pattern . Volunteers ask wear prototype comparative device 1-2 night . The data device download completion study analysis wil perform compare two recording .
